description: The Senate of Canada (Senate) is seeking to establish a contract for vehicle maintenance services for its fleet of vehicle, as defined in Annex \
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Vehicle Maintenance Services for the Senate of Canada Fleet

### Solicitation Details

*   **Tender Number:** RFP SEN-073 23/24
*   **Tender Title:** Vehicle Maintenance (Fleet)
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 12, 2024, 11:00 AM Eastern Time
*   **Publication Date:** March 26, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 14, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** June 15, 2027

### Contract Summary

The Senate of Canada invites bidders to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the vehicle maintenance services for its fleet of vehicles. The contract is expected to be for a period of three years, with two one-year option periods.

### Tender Overview

The contract requirements and scope of work are outlined in Annex “A” - Statement of Work, which is part of the tender package. Suppliers are required to submit a Technical and Financial Proposal, as outlined in the tender documents.

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection of the successful supplier will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price, using the outlined evaluation criteria.

### Tender Documents

All tender documents, including the Request for Proposal, terms of reference, and schedules, are available on the Canada639 procurement website. Bidders must register on the platform to access the documents.

### Contact Information

**Name:** Christine Tremblay
**Email:** [christine.tremblay@sen.parl.gc.ca](mailto:christine.tremblay@sen.parl.gc.ca)
**Phone:** (343) 549-7538

### Attachment

All documents attached to this tender, including the RFP, Annex C - Basis of Payment, and Supplier Creation, Direct Enrolment Deposit Enrolment Form, are available on the Canada Bureau Buy website.
